nanomsg.async

Class AsyncSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • nanomsg.async.AsyncSocket

  • public class AsyncSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    Experimental socket proxy that enables async way to send or receive data from socket.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncSocket(ISocket socket)
      Given any socket that implements ISocket interface create new AsyncSocket proxy for it.
      AsyncSocket(ISocket socket, IAsyncScheduler scheduler)
      Given any socket that implements ISocket interface and scheduler instance, create new AsyncSocket proxy for it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recvBytes(IAsyncCallback<byte[]> callback)
      Given a callback, it try receive data from socket using the common defined executor and execute callback whet any data received.
      void recvString(IAsyncCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
      Given a callback, it try receive data from socket using the common defined executor and execute callback whet any data received.
      void sendBytes(byte[] data, IAsyncCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Given a string and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.
      void sendString(java.lang.String data, IAsyncCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Given a string and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncSocket

        public AsyncSocket(ISocket socket)
        Given any socket that implements ISocket interface create new AsyncSocket proxy for it. NOTE: this reuses a common scheduler.
        Parameters:
        socket - any socket that implements ISocket interface

      • AsyncSocket

        public AsyncSocket(ISocket socket,
           IAsyncScheduler scheduler)
        Given any socket that implements ISocket interface and scheduler instance, create new AsyncSocket proxy for it.
        Parameters:
        socket - any socket that implements ISocket interface

    • Method Detail

      • sendString

        public void sendString(java.lang.String data,
              IAsyncCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Given a string and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.
        Parameters:
        data - string to send.
        callback - IAsyncCallback interface object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • recvString

        public void recvString(IAsyncCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Given a callback, it try receive data from socket using the common defined executor and execute callback whet any data received.
        Parameters:
        callback - IAsyncCallback interface object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        Given a string and callback, sends data using a proxied socket using a common executor and execute a callback when it are finished.
